Desc:
> - `Cooldown: 120s`
> Nearby allies instantly restore 15% **Max HP** and increase 15% **Movement Speed** for 2s

> - `Cooldown: 9s`
> Instantly attacks nearby enemies, deals **True Damage** equals Target's 16% Lost HP

> - `Cooldown: 120s`
> Removes all **Debuffs** and **Control Effects**. Gains **Super Armor** for 1.5s

> - `Cooldown: 90s`
> Reduces nearby enemies' 20% **Damage Dealt** and gains 20% **Damage Reduction** for 4s

> - `Cooldown: 120s`
> Teleports a certain distance in the target direction

> - `Cooldown: 60s`
> Increases 25% **Resistance** and 10% **Damage Dealt**, while healing 2% **Max HP** every second over 6s

> - `Cooldown: 90s`
> Stuns all nearby enemies for 0.75s
> Then, reduces Targets' 20% **Movement Speed**, (28 + Lv*2) **Armor**, and (14 + Lv) **Magic Armor** for 2.5s

> - `Cooldown: 100s`
> Removes all **Slow** effects and gain a diminishing (70% - 30%) **Movement Speed** for 10s

> - `Cooldown: 30s` 
> <:Punish:1129233280802242660>: Deals (1350 - 2750) **True Damage** to a nearby Wildling / Minion and stun them for 1s
> <:Frostbite:1129233601578414140>: Simultaneously cast on a nearby enemy, dealing (200 - 410) **True Damage** with 50% **Slow** for 2s
